content: Tom Ã¨ stato brutalmente pestato e medici lo hanno dovuto mettere in un coma indotto per alleviare il gonfiore nel suo cervello.
translations: eng:Tom was viciously bashed and doctors had to put him into an induced coma to relieve the swelling on his brain
